                  throws java.io.IOException

      • getProxy

      • openSocket

        public static java.net.Socket openSocket(java.lang.String address,
                                         int port)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Opens a plain-text socket connection over the Tor network. Avoids DNS leaking.
        Parameters:
        address - The destination address.
        port - The destination port.
        Returns:
        The opened socket ready for read / write operations.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On Socket.connect() failure.

      • openSSLSocket

        public static javax.net.ssl.SSLSocket openSSLSocket(java.lang.String address,
                                                    int port)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Opens a secure SSL socket connection over the Tor network. Avoids DNS leaking.
        Parameters:
        address - The destination address.
        port - The destination port.
        Returns:
        The opened socket ready for read / write operations.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On Socket.connect() failure.

      • isProcessAlive

        public static boolean isProcessAlive()
        Is the Tor proxy process alive.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the process is alive, else FALSE.

      • stop

        public static void stop()
        Stops the Tor proxy process.
